game.name: Kawaii Survivors
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fight endless enemy hordes in a glitched cyberpunk world as Lucy the cosplayer. This bullet heaven roguelite blends kawaii anime aesthetics with intense top-down survivors-like action. Use cosplay powers to battle waves of corrupted enemies. Pure bullet hell chaos with a touch of 90s anime.
